title: Understanding Treemap Charts
text: A treemap chart is a type of data visualization that displays hierarchical data using nested rectangles. Each branch of the hierarchy is represented as a rectangle, which is then tiled with smaller rectangles representing sub-branches.

title: Purpose of Treemap Charts
text: Treemap charts are particularly useful for visualizing large amounts of hierarchical data in a compact space. They help in identifying patterns, trends, and relationships within the data.

hintAnswer: provides a hierarchical, visual view of data, making it easy to spot patterns and trends
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following best describes the function of a treemap chart?
choices: provides a hierarchical, visual view of data, making it easy to spot patterns and trends
provides a hierarchical, visual view of data
provides a comparison of data over times
